a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Child mortality vs. per capita health expenditure, 2019
Healthcare expenditure per capita is measured in current international-$, which adjusts for price differences
between countries. Child mortality is the number of under-five deaths, per 1,000 live births.
Current health expenditure per capita, PPP
Data source: UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation; World Health Organization (via World Bank)
